author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the olive oil in a wok, add the rest of the ingredients and stir-fry over a high heat for 2-3 minutes, or until warmed through.  To serve, spoon the noodles into a bowl and garnish with the lime wedges.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  100g/3½oz egg noodles, cooked according to packet instructions,  1 handful fresh parsley, chopped,  1 handful fresh coriander, chopped,  squeeze lemon juice,  2 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted,  2 tbsp soy sauce,  ¼ red chilli, chopped,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  lime wedges, to garnish
